description: This week’s Hammer of Math examines the distribution of tasks within the Pariah Nexus Mission Deck. title: Hammer of Math: Pariah Nexus Secondary Mission Distribution

description: After seeing a recent Facebook poll over at the Frontline Gaming page asking how yellow cards and point deductions should be handled. title: Stop Competing: Our Broken Approach to Misplay & Cheating in Competitive 40k

description: Who Are the Byzantines? The Byzantines within Saga Age of Crusades represent the Eastern Roman Empire, present from approximately the 4th century to the 15th century, ending with the fall of Constantinople. Age of Crusades is set within a narrower window, with many of the choices drawing from alter in the empires history. The Byzantine […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: SAGA Faction Review – Byzantines
